        public boolean applyDiscount​(java.lang.String vehicleRegNumber)
        Description copied from interface: IRecurringVehiculeService
        Is a vehicle recurrent or not
        • if not recurrent, is stored in DBB, return false;
        • if recurrent, DBB is updated (last_visit), return true
        Specified by:
